logLevel.name: Configure the log level of the application
logLevel.description:
Configure the log level of the application
Integer value, 0~5:Trace,Debug,Info,Warning,Error,Fatal

logPath.name: Configure the log path of the application
logPath.description:
Configure the log path of the application
Absolute path

rollingNumber.name: Rolling number of log files
rollingNumber.description:
Control the number of log files within this range
Integer value, minimum 1

datePattern.name: Log write policy
datePattern.description:
Time period for creating log files
Integer value, 0~5:Minutely,Hourly,HalfDaily,Daily,Weekly,Monthly

logFormat.name: Display log according to format string
logFormat.name[zh_CN]: 根据格式字符格式化日志输出
logFormat.description:
Configure the display format of the log
For example:%{time}{yyyy-MM-dd, HH:mm:ss.zzz} [%{type:-7}] [%{file:-20} %{function:-35} %{line}] %{message}\n
